grades_persistent.name: course_id
grades_persistent.description: Course key of the containing course. In the format course-v1:org+course+run for courses created after DATE and in the format org/course/run for older courses.

grades_persistent.name: grading_policy_hash
grades_persistent.description: A SHA-1 digest of the course grading policy that allows edX to detect and update grades whenever the policy changes. For example, NiGhcAFSrpyijXbow/XKE1Cp1GA=.

grades_persistent.name: percent_grade
grades_persistent.description: The learner’s calculated course grade as a decimal percentage, per grading policy. For example, 0.91 (meaning 91%).

grades_persistent.name: letter_grade
grades_persistent.description: The learner’s calculated course grade as a letter value, per grading policy. If the learner’s grade is Fail or F, this cell value is empty. For example, Pass or A.

grades_persistent.name: passed_timestamp
grades_persistent.description: Time when the learner first passed the course. If this cell value is empty, the learner never passed the course. If this cell value is non-empty but the letter_grade value is empty, the learner transitioned from passing to not passing.

grades_persistent.name: created
grades_persistent.description: Time the course grade was first calculated for this user for this course.

grades_persistent.name: modified
grades_persistent.description: Time the course grade was last updated for this user for this course.

description: grades_persistent is the table that keeps track of learners' grades. It's generated by the simeon CLI tool from the file grades_persistentcoursegrade-analytics.sql in the SQL bundle.
